tweet: SNAP! OK - balance snapshot all done! We've now got some work to do behind the scenes to get everything ready for the next phase in the rollout. Back soon! Meanwhile, you can find out more about what's next here  https://t.co/sbeVQrhiwV #Cardano #Shelley  https://t.co/qMEk8VEyva
Merchants can now accept payments in ADA with settlement into 35 fiat currencies via Cardano’s AdaPay  https://t.co/sjt9aQh23M
Hi! Are you ready for the #Shelley Incentivized Testnet balance snapshot today (Nov. 29th) at 12pm (midday) UTC? Let us know in the poll below! #Cardano #ada #blockchain

The weekly #Cardano development update is fresh out today! Get the latest lowdown on what IOHK teams have been working on. Check it out here:    https://t.co/2TtYduOovM #blockchain #CardanoCommunity  https://t.co/tPGLz2EWID

Jack Dorsey, CEO of Twitter was in Ethiopia and meet with IOHK Director of Operation Jack Conor.   Jack will move to Africa for at least 3 months next year because the continent will "define the future".  Bullish also for #Cardano $ADA in the long term.   https://t.co/WNdzR79NWz

So today, we successfully captured the Balance snapshot, to prepare for the Shelley Incentivized Testnet. We've another busy week ahead, with more prepping behind-the-scenes. Meanwhile, got any questions? Here's where to go #Cardano  https://t.co/lt66lHwIUA  https://t.co/y4lZXNfrBS

Ahead of the Shelley Incentivized Testnet balance snapshot at 12 noon UTC tomorrow, please head over to  https://t.co/sbeVQrhiwV for more information. There's an extensive list of FAQs answered, and a newsletter sign for fresh updates #Shelley #Cardano  https://t.co/pHgduxvEvS

Congratulations on the #Shelley incentivized Testnet snapshot! Today marks the beginning of a new era of #PoS, #Cardano leading the way. Thanks to all the teams and #CardanoCommunity members who’ve worked endlessly to get it all set up and running. Exciting times ahead! 🥳 #ada

Have you recently seen #ADA Giveaways? Beware of fake representatives and entities that claim to give away ada for free! Do not disclose your private information. Read more here:   https://t.co/IFLabUFPOd #ShelleyStaySafe #Cardano  https://t.co/bptgS3zOLN

@IOHK_Charles Only the passion and determination of a few individuals helped to change the world in the past.   It is 100% true in the case of Charles Hoskinson. Check his AMA or Twitter and you will see how he is devoted to Cardano.

To participate in the Cardano incentivized test net snapshot tomorrow at 12:00 UTC, November 29th - simply hold your Ada in Daedalus, Yoroi or Yoroi mobile on the main net and NOT on a hardware wallet. Quick checklist video and FAQ here  https://t.co/kcrDHXMHYU
Out of all the majors on $BTC pairs, $ADA is looking the best and it's not even close.  https://t.co/RKmOreP7sz
Hot off the press it's your weekly Cardano development update!

🎁Check this out!  Online demo shop setup by Coti to show users how their AdaPay experience will look.  AdaPay allows users to buy goods & services with $ADA while allowing near realtime settlement into 35 native fiat currencies for the merchant.  WIN-WIN   https://t.co/xjzCohElU5
The Cardano Foundation Launches Adapay, An Ada Based Payment Gateway For Merchants  https://t.co/OL15wBkfoV

Now that the #Cardano Snapshot is completed, what’s next❓  With the incentivized phase of the #testnet program, delegate your stake in the network to earn rewards, help us learn, and become part of the Cardano journey.

Hello all. A new opportunity to follow people with our #FollowFriday! This time we want to highlight people who have been highly active and valuable with the #Shelley #Testnet again. Please give @oldcryptogeek and @markusgufler a follow. Thanks! #cardano #cardanocommunity
